author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Office Depot Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.08 From Continuing Operations
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Office Depot Inc:
* OFFICE DEPOT ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 SALES $2.8 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.72 BILLION * INCREASES FULL-YEAR OUTLOOK FOR 2018
* INCREASES FULL-YEAR OUTLOOK FOR 2018
* BUSINESS SOLUTIONS DIVISION REPORTED SALES WERE $1.3 BILLION IN Q1 OF 2018, UP 1%
* RETAIL DIVISION REPORTED SALES WERE $1.2 BILLION IN Q1 OF 2018
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED OPERATING INCOME ABOUT $360 MILLION * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $10.75 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* OFFICE DEPOT - SEES 2018 FREE CASH FLOW ABOUT $350 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
